# About the Farm Validation Project

The **Farm Validation Project** aims to:
- Detect invalid or fake farms using advanced validation techniques.
- Remove outliers to ensure unbiased and interpretable data visualizations.

This project is part of our initiative to create reliable datasets for decision-making and analytics.

For more information, visit the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/ubc-litefarm-datateam/LiteFarm-Data-Processing-Guide).
